title: Multimedia-Based Scientific Inquiry Project: Designing Individual and Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Learners analyze and integrate multimedia materials using personal devices (BYOD) and visualize the scientific inquiry process through poster creation. Individual tasks and collaborative learning are conducted in parallel throughout the project.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively navigate, analyze, and extract key information from multimedia resources on scientific topics.
Learners can systematically present scientific inquiry results in poster format through digital tools and collaborative activities.
Learners can construct scientific arguments while resolving information conflicts identified through peer interactions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
